ResourceHeader.Description:
4-sec vector magnetic field values recorded by the ESA ISEE-2 
satellite, in spacecraft coordinates (close to GSE), available from UCLA and CDAWeb 
value-added interfaces and, via ftp, in binary from UCLA and in CDF from 
CDAWeb. (This descriptor updated, 6/20110, by J.King, to reflect CDAWeb accessibility
and to insert CDAWeb parameter keys.)
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
UCLA-IGPP ISEE Magnetometer Team, and the source
used for accessing data (see below).

InformationURL.Name: UCLA-IGPP ISEE Magnetometer Interactive Data Server
InformationURL.Description: Data at 60-s and 4-s resolution are available for the entire ISEE mission (October 22, 1977 through  September 25, 1987) and can be displayed either as a plot or an ASCII listing. The ISEE-1 and -2 magnetometer data server is provided by the Institute of Geophysics and Planetary Physics (IGPP) at UCLA, through a grant to Robert J. Strangeway from the NASA Space Physics Data System (SPDS).

AccessURL.Name: FTP access to files at SPDF
HTTP access to files at SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from SPDF

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: UCLA ISEE Magnetometer and GSFC CDAWeb teams

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Plots, lists and files from CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: UCLA ISEE Magnetometer and GSFC CDAWeb teams

AccessURL.Name: UCLA interactive interface
AccessURL.Description: Interactive interface at UCLA providing plots and lists of data

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: UCLA-IGPP ISEE Magnetometer Interactive Data Server

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Components
Parameter.Description: Cartesian components of magnetic field vector in spacecraft coordinates

Structure.Description: The three elements are BX, BY, and BZ.
